alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 2:30AM MST until January 19 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet with locally higher amounts above 10000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM Wednesday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
